summary: The module implements a loss component for Recurrent Neural Network Transducer (RNNT) models used in automatic speech recognition. It validates inputs, selects among multiple RNNT loss back‑ends (standard PyTorch, multiblank, TDT, and optional warp‑RNNT/k2 implementations), computes the loss per time step, and applies optional reduction for training. Helper utilities clean and warn about extra arguments and resolve default loss identifiers.
business_intent: Enable accurate and flexible training of sequence‑to‑sequence speech recognition systems by providing a robust RNNT loss calculation that can adapt to different backend implementations and ensure correct input handling.
